utilities

Class Penalty

  • java.lang.Object
    • utilities.Penalty

  • public class Penalty
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that represents a Penalty.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Penalty

        public Penalty(int libTicketNum)
        Constructor for creating a new Penalty.
        Parameters:
        libTicketNum - The libTicketNum of the Member who has this Penalty.

      • Penalty

        public Penalty(int libTicketNum,
               java.util.Date startDate,
               java.util.Date midDate,
               java.util.Date endDate)
        Constructor for creating a new Penalty.
        Parameters:
        libTicketNum - The libTicketNum of the Member who has this Penalty.
        startDate - The date when this Penalty has started. Till midDate, we can't borrow any Books.
        midDate - From this date, we can borrow maximum 2 Books.
        endDate - The date when this Penalty has ended. Now, we can borrow the maximum amount of Books (i.e. 4).

    • Method Detail

      • getLibTicketNum

        public int getLibTicketNum()
        Getter function for the Member's library ticket number, who has this Penalty.
        Returns:
        The Member's library ticket number as an int.

        public java.util.Date getStartDate()

        Returns:
        The Penalty's mid date as a Date.

      • getEndDate

        public java.util.Date getEndDate()
        Getter function for this Penalty's end date.
        Returns:
        The Penalty's end date as a Date.

      • inSecondWeek

        public boolean inSecondWeek()
        Function for retrieving if this Penalty has passed its mid date.
        Returns:
        Whether this Penalty has passed its mid date or it hasn't.
